00035 # The table format has been borrowed from the Grades.pm module
00036 sub initialize {
00037     my $self     = shift; 
00038     # FIXME  are there args here?
00039     my @components = @_;
00040     my $r          = $self->{r};
00041     my $urlpath    = $r->urlpath;
00042     my $type       = $urlpath->arg("statType") || '';
00043     my $db         = $self->{db};
00044     my $ce         = $self->{ce};
00045     my $authz      = $self->{authz};
00046     my $courseName = $urlpath->arg('courseID');
00047     my $user       = $r->param('user');
00048     
00049     # Check permissions
00050     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00051     
00052     $self->{type}  = $type;
00053     if ($type eq 'student') {
00054         my $studentName = $r->urlpath->arg("userID") || $user;
00055         $self->{studentName } = $studentName;
00056         
00057     } elsif ($type eq 'set') {
00058         my $setName = $r->urlpath->arg("setID") || 0;
00059         $self->{setName}     = $setName;
00060         my $setRecord  = $db->getGlobalSet($setName); # checked
00061         die $r->maketext("global set [_1]  not found.", $setName) unless $setRecord;
00062         $self->{set_due_date} = $setRecord->due_date;
00063         $self->{setRecord}   = $setRecord;
00064     }
00065     
00066     
00067 }

00070 sub title { 
00071     my ($self) = @_;
00072     my $r = $self->r;
00073     my $authz = $r->authz;
00074     my $user = $r->param('user');
00075 
00076     return "" unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00077     
00078     my $type                = $self->{type};
00079     my $string              = $r->maketext("Statistics for").$self->{ce}->{courseName}." ";
00080     
00081     if ($type eq 'student') {
00082         $string             .= $r->maketext("student")." ".$self->{studentName};
00083     } elsif ($type eq 'set' ) {
00084         $string             .= $r->maketext("set")."   ".$self->{setName};
00085         $string             .= ".&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ".$r->maketext("Due")." ".$self->formatDateTime($self->{set_due_date});
00086     }
00087     return $string;
00088 }
00089 sub siblings {
00090     my ($self) = @_;
00091     my $r = $self->r;
00092     my $db = $r->db;
00093     my $authz = $r->authz;
00094     my $user = $r->param('user');
00095     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00096     
00097     # Check permissions
00098     return "" unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00099     
00100     my $courseID = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00101     my $eUserID  = $r->param("effectiveUser");
00102     my @setIDs   = sort  $db->listGlobalSets;
00103     
00104     my $stats     = $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Stats", $r,  
00105                                             courseID => $courseID);
00106     
00107     print CGI::start_div({class=>"info-box", id=>"fisheye"});
00108     print CGI::h2("Statistics");
00109     #print CGI::start_ul({class=>"LinksMenu"});
00110     #print CGI::start_li();
00111     #print CGI::span({style=>"font-size:larger"}, CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($stats)}, 'Statistics'));
00112     print CGI::start_ul();
00113     
00114     foreach my $setID (@setIDs) {
00115         my $problemPage = $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Stats", $r, 
00116             courseID => $courseID, setID => $setID,statType => 'set',);
00117         print CGI::li(CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($problemPage)}, WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::underscore2nbsp($setID)));
00118     }
00119     
00120     print CGI::end_ul();
00121     #print CGI::end_li();
00122     #print CGI::end_ul();
00123     print CGI::end_div();
00124     
00125     return "";
00126 }
00127 sub body {
00128     my $self       = shift;
00129     my $r          = $self->r;
00130     my $urlpath    = $r->urlpath;
00131     my $db         = $r->db;
00132     my $ce         = $r->ce;
00133     my $authz      = $r->authz;
00134     my $courseName = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00135     my $user       = $r->param('user');
00136     my $type       = $self->{type};
00137 
00138     # Check permissions
00139     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p($r->maketext("You are not authorized to access instructor tools")))
00140         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00141     
00142     if ($type eq 'student') {
00143         my $studentName = $self->{studentName};
00144         my $studentRecord = $db->getUser($studentName) # checked
00145             or die $r->maketext("record for user [_1] not found", $studentName);
00146         my $fullName = $studentRecord->full_name;
00147         my $courseHomePage = $urlpath->new(type  => 'set_list',
00148             args => {courseID=>$courseName});
00149         my $email = $studentRecord->email_address;
00150         
00151         print CGI::a({-href=>"mailto:$email"}, $email), CGI::br(),
00152             $r->maketext("Section:")." ", $studentRecord->section, CGI::br(),
00153             $r->maketext("Recitation:")." ", $studentRecord->recitation, CGI::br();
00154         
00155         if ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "become_student")) {
00156             my $act_as_student_url = $self->systemLink($courseHomePage,
00157                 params => {effectiveUser=>$studentName});
00158             
00159             print $r->maketext('Act as:')." ", CGI::a({-href=>$act_as_student_url},$studentRecord->user_id);
00160         }
00161         
00162         print WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Grades::displayStudentStats($self,$studentName);
00163     } elsif( $type eq 'set') {
00164         $self->displaySets($self->{setName});
00165     } elsif ($type eq '') {
00166         $self->index;
00167     } else {
00168         warn $r->maketext("Don't recognize statistics display type: |[_1]|", $type);
00169     }
00170     
00171     return '';
00172 }
00173 sub index {
00174     my $self          = shift;
00175     my $r             = $self->r;
00176     my $urlpath       = $r->urlpath;
00177     my $ce            = $r->ce;
00178     my $db            = $r->db;
00179     my $courseName    = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00180     
00181     # DBFIXME sort in database
00182     my @studentList   = sort $db->listUsers;
00183     my @setList       = sort  $db->listGlobalSets;
00184     
00185     
00186     my @setLinks      = ();
00187     my @studentLinks  = (); 
00188     foreach my $set (@setList) {
00189         my $setStatisticsPage   = $urlpath->newFromModule($urlpath->module, $r, 
00190                                                           courseID => $courseName,
00191                                                           statType => 'set',
00192                                                           setID    => $set
00193         );
00194         push @setLinks, CGI::a({-href=>$self->systemLink($setStatisticsPage) }, WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::underscore2nbsp($set));
00195     }
00196     
00197     foreach my $student (@studentList) {
00198         my $userStatisticsPage  = $urlpath->newFromModule($urlpath->module, $r, 
00199                                                           courseID => $courseName,
00200                                                           statType => 'student',
00201                                                           userID   => $student
00202         );
00203         push @studentLinks, CGI::a({-href=>$self->systemLink($userStatisticsPage,
00204                                                              prams=>{effectiveUser => $student}
00205                                                              )},"  $student" ),;    
00206     }
00207     print join("",
00208         CGI::start_table({-border=>2, -cellpadding=>20}),
00209         CGI::Tr({},
00210             CGI::td({-valign=>'top'}, 
00211                 CGI::h3({-align=>'center'},$r->maketext('View statistics by set')),
00212                 CGI::ul(  CGI::li( [@setLinks] ) ), 
00213             ),
00214             CGI::td({-valign=>'top'}, 
00215                 CGI::h3({-align=>'center'},$r->maketext('View statistics by student')),
00216                 CGI::ul(CGI::li( [ @studentLinks ] ) ),
00217             ),
00218         ),
00219         CGI::end_table(),
00220     );
00221     
00222 }
00223 ###################################################
00224 # Determines the percentage of students whose score is greater than a given value
00225 # The percentages are fixed at 75, 50, 25 and 5%
00226 sub determine_percentiles {
00227     my $percent_brackets  = shift;
00228     my @list_of_scores    = @_;
00229     @list_of_scores       = sort {$a<=>$b} @list_of_scores;
00230     my %percentiles          = ();
00231     my $num_students      = $#list_of_scores;
00232     foreach my $percentage (@{$percent_brackets}) {
00233         $percentiles{$percentage} = @list_of_scores[int( (100-$percentage)*$num_students/100)];
00234         $percentiles{$percentage} =0 unless defined($percentiles{$percentage});  #in case no students have tried this question
00235     }
00236     # for example
00237     # $percentiles{75}  = @list_of_scores[int( 25*$num_students/100)]; 
00238     # means that 75% of the students received this score ($percentiles{75}) or higher
00239     %percentiles;
00240 }
00241 sub prevent_repeats {    # replace a string such as 0 0 0 86 86 100 100 100 by    0 - - 86 - 100 - -
00242     my @inarray   = @_;
00243     my @outarray = ();
00244     my $saved_item = shift @inarray;
00245     push @outarray, $saved_item;
00246     while (@inarray )   {
00247         my $current_item = shift @inarray;
00248         if ( $current_item == $saved_item ) {
00249             push @outarray, '&nbsp;-';
00250         } else {
00251             push @outarray, $current_item;
00252             $saved_item = $current_item;
00253         }
00254     }
00255     @outarray;
00256 }
00257         
00258 sub displaySets {
00259     my $self             = shift;   
00260     my $r                = $self->r;
00261     my $urlpath          = $r->urlpath;
00262     my $db               = $r->db;
00263     my $ce               = $r->ce;
00264     my $authz            = $r->authz;
00265     my $courseName       = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00266     my $setName          = $urlpath->arg("setID");
00267     my $user             = $r->param('user');
00268     my $setRecord        = $self->{setRecord};
00269     my $root             = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00270     
00271     my $setStatsPage     = $urlpath->newFromModule($urlpath->module, $r, courseID=>$courseName,statType=>'sets',setID=>$setName);
00272     my $sort_method_name = $r->param('sort');  
00273     # DBFIXME duplicate call
00274     my @studentList      = $db->listUsers;
00275     
00276     my @index_list                           = ();  # list of all student index 
00277     my @score_list                           = ();  # list of all student total percentage scores 
00278     my %attempts_list_for_problem            = ();  # a list of the number of attempts for each problem
00279     my %number_of_attempts_for_problem       = ();  # the total number of attempst for this problem (sum of above list)
00280     my %number_of_students_attempting_problem = ();  # the number of students attempting this problem.
00281     my %correct_answers_for_problem          = ();  # the number of students correctly answering this problem (partial correctness allowed)
00282     my $sort_method = sub {
00283         my ($a,$b) = @_;
00284         return 0 unless defined($sort_method_name);
00285         return $b->{score} <=> $a->{score} if $sort_method_name eq 'score';
00286         return $b->{index} <=> $a->{index} if $sort_method_name eq 'index';
00287         return $a->{section} cmp $b->{section} if $sort_method_name eq 'section';
00288         if ($sort_method_name =~/p(\d+)/) {
00289             my $left  =  $b->{problemData}->{$1} ||0;
00290             my $right =  $a->{problemData}->{$1} ||0;
00291             return $left <=> $right;  # sort by number of attempts.
00292         }
00293 
00294     };
00295 
00296 ###############################################################
00297 #  Print tables
00298 ###############################################################
00299     
00300     my $max_num_problems  = 0;
00301     # get user records
00302     debug("Begin obtaining problem records for  set $setName");
00303     # DBFIXME use an iterator
00304     my @userRecords  = $db->getUsers(@studentList);
00305     debug("End obtaining user records for set $setName");
00306     debug("begin main loop");
00307     my @augmentedUserRecords    = ();
00308     my $number_of_active_students;
00309     
00310     ########################################
00311     # Notes for factoring this calculation
00312     #
00313     # Inputs include:
00314     # $user
00315     # $setName
00316     # @userRecords
00317     #               @problemRecords  these are fetched for each student in @userRecords
00318     #
00319     ###################################
00320    
00321     foreach my $studentRecord (@userRecords)   {
00322         next unless ref($studentRecord);
00323         my $student = $studentRecord->user_id;
00324         next if $studentRecord->last_name =~/^practice/i;  # don't show practice users
00325         next unless $ce->status_abbrev_has_behavior($studentRecord->status, "include_in_stats");
00326         $number_of_active_students++;
00327         my $string          = '';
00328         my $twoString       = '';
00329         my $totalRight      = 0;
00330         my $total           = 0;
00331         my $total_num_of_attempts_for_set = 0;
00332         my %h_problemData   = ();
00333         my $probNum         = 0;
00334         
00335         debug("Begin obtaining problem records for user $student set $setName");
00336         
00337         # DBFIXME use an iterator
00338         my @problemRecords;
00339         if ( $setRecord->assignment_type =~ /gateway/ ) {
00340             my @setVersions = $db->listSetVersions($student, $setName);
00341             foreach my $ver ( @setVersions ) {
00342                 push( @problemRecords,
00343                       $db->getAllProblemVersions($student,
00344                                  $setName, $ver) );
00345             }
00346         } else {
00347             @problemRecords = sort {$a->problem_id <=> $b->problem_id } $db->getAllUserProblems( $student, $setName );
00348         }
00349         debug("End obtaining problem records for user $student set $setName");
00350 
00351         my $num_of_problems = @problemRecords;
00352         $max_num_problems = ($max_num_problems>= $num_of_problems) ? $max_num_problems : $num_of_problems;
00353        ########################################
00354         # Notes for factoring the calculation in this loop.
00355         #
00356         # Inputs include:
00357         # 
00358         #
00359         # @problemRecords  
00360         # returns
00361         #       $num_of_attempts
00362         #       $status
00363         # updates
00364         #       $number_of_students_attempting_problem{$probID}++;
00365         #       @{ $attempts_list_for_problem{$probID} }   
00366         #       $number_of_attempts_for_problem{$probID}          
00367         #       $total_num_of_attempts_for_set                    
00368         #       $correct_answers_for_problem{$probID}   
00369         #    
00370         #       $string (formatting output)
00371         #       $twoString (more formatted output)
00372         #       $total
00373         #       $totalRight
00374         ###################################
00375    
00376         foreach my $problemRecord (@problemRecords) {
00377             next unless ref($problemRecord);
00378 
00379                 # warn "Can't find record for problem $prob in set $setName for $student";
00380                 # FIXME check the legitimate reasons why a student record might not be defined
00381             ####################################################################
00382             # Grab data from the database
00383             ####################################################################
00384             # It's possible that $problemRecord->num_correct or $problemRecord->num_correct
00385             # or $problemRecord->status is an empty 
00386             # or blank string instead of 0.  The || clause fixes this and prevents 
00387             # warning messages in the comparisons below.
00388             
00389             my $probID             = $problemRecord->problem_id;
00390             my $attempted          = $problemRecord->attempted;
00391             my $num_correct        = $problemRecord->num_correct     || 0;
00392             my $num_incorrect      = $problemRecord->num_incorrect   || 0;
00393             my $num_of_attempts    = $num_correct + $num_incorrect;
00394             
00395             # initialize the number of correct answers for this problem 
00396             # if the value has not been defined.
00397             $correct_answers_for_problem{$probID}  = 0 unless defined($correct_answers_for_problem{$probID});
00398         
00399             
00400             my $probValue          = $problemRecord->value;
00401             # set default problem value here
00402             $probValue             = 1 unless defined($probValue) and $probValue ne "";  # FIXME?? set defaults here?
00403             
00404             my $status             = $problemRecord->status          || 0;
00405             # sanity check that the status (score) is between 0 and 1
00406             my $valid_status       = ($status >= 0 and $status <=1 ) ? 1 : 0;
00407             
00408             ###################################################################
00409             # Determine the string $longStatus which will display the student's current score
00410             ###################################################################
00411             my $longStatus = '';
00412             if (!$attempted){
00413                 $longStatus     = '.';
00414             } elsif   ($valid_status) {
00415                 $longStatus     = int(100*$status+.5);
00416                 $longStatus     = ($longStatus == 100) ? 'C' : $longStatus;
00417             } else  {
00418                 $longStatus     = 'X';
00419             }
00420             
00421             $string          .=  threeSpaceFill($longStatus);
00422             $twoString       .= threeSpaceFill($num_incorrect);
00423 
00424             $total           += $probValue;
00425             $totalRight      += round_score($status*$probValue) if $valid_status;
00426 
00427             
00428             
00429             
00430             
00431             
00432              # add on the scores for this problem
00433             if (defined($attempted) and $attempted) {
00434                 $number_of_students_attempting_problem{$probID}++;
00435                 push( @{ $attempts_list_for_problem{$probID} } ,     $num_of_attempts);
00436                 $number_of_attempts_for_problem{$probID}             += $num_of_attempts;
00437                 $h_problemData{$probID}                               = $num_incorrect;
00438                 $total_num_of_attempts_for_set                       += $num_of_attempts;
00439                 $correct_answers_for_problem{$probID}                += $status;
00440             }
00441             
00442         }
00443         
00444         
00445         my $act_as_student_url = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'set_list',args=>{courseID=>$courseName}),
00446                                                    params=>{effectiveUser => $studentRecord->user_id}
00447         );
00448         my $email              = $studentRecord->email_address;
00449         # FIXME  this needs formatting
00450         
00451         my $avg_num_attempts = ($num_of_problems) ? $total_num_of_attempts_for_set/$num_of_problems : 0;
00452         my $successIndicator = ($avg_num_attempts) ? ($totalRight/$total)**2/$avg_num_attempts : 0 ;
00453         
00454         my $temp_hash         = {         user_id        => $studentRecord->user_id,
00455                                           last_name      => $studentRecord->last_name,
00456                                           first_name     => $studentRecord->first_name,
00457                                           score          => $totalRight,
00458                                           total          => $total,
00459                                           index          => $successIndicator,
00460                                           section        => $studentRecord->section,
00461                                           recitation     => $studentRecord->recitation,
00462                                           problemString  => "<pre>$string\n$twoString</pre>",
00463                                           act_as_student => $act_as_student_url,
00464                                           email_address  => $studentRecord->email_address,
00465                                           problemData    => {%h_problemData},
00466         }; 
00467         # add this data to the list of total scores (out of 100)
00468         # add this data to the list of success indices.
00469         push( @index_list, $temp_hash->{index});
00470         push( @score_list, ($temp_hash->{total}) ?$temp_hash->{score}/$temp_hash->{total} : 0 ) ;
00471         push( @augmentedUserRecords, $temp_hash );
00472                                         
00473     }   
00474     debug("end mainloop");
00475     
00476     @augmentedUserRecords = sort {           &$sort_method($a,$b)
00477                                                 ||
00478                             lc($a->{last_name}) cmp lc($b->{last_name} ) } @augmentedUserRecords;
00479     
00480     # sort the problem IDs
00481     my @problemIDs         = sort {$a<=>$b} keys %correct_answers_for_problem;
00482     # determine index quartiles
00483     my @brackets1          = (90,80,70,60,50,40,30,20,10);  #% students having scores or indices above this cutoff value
00484     my @brackets2          = (95, 75,50,25,5,1);       # % students having this many incorrect attempts or more  
00485     my %index_percentiles = determine_percentiles(\@brackets1, @index_list);
00486     my %score_percentiles = determine_percentiles(\@brackets1, @score_list);
00487     my %attempts_percentiles_for_problem = ();
00488     my %problemPage                      = (); # link to the problem page
00489     foreach my $probID (@problemIDs) {
00490         $attempts_percentiles_for_problem{$probID} =   {
00491             determine_percentiles([@brackets2], @{$attempts_list_for_problem{$probID}})
00492 
00493         }; 
00494         $problemPage{$probID} = $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Problem", $r, 
00495             courseID => $courseName, setID => $setName, problemID => $probID);
00496 
00497     }
00498

00500 # Table showing the percentage of students with correct answers for each problems
00501 #####################################################################################
00502 
00503 print  
00504 
00505        CGI::p($r->maketext('The percentage of active students with correct answers for each problem')),
00506         CGI::start_table({-border=>1}),
00507         CGI::Tr(CGI::td(
00508             [$r->maketext('Problem').' #', 
00509                map {CGI::a({ href=>$self->systemLink($problemPage{$_}) },$_)} @problemIDs
00510             ]
00511         )),
00512         CGI::Tr(CGI::td(
00513             [ '% '.$r->maketext('correct'),map {($number_of_students_attempting_problem{$_})
00514                                   ? sprintf("%0.0f",100*$correct_answers_for_problem{$_}/$number_of_students_attempting_problem{$_})
00515                                   : '-'}                               
00516                                    @problemIDs 
00517             ]
00518         )),
00519         CGI::Tr(CGI::td(
00520             [ $r->maketext('avg attempts'),map {($number_of_students_attempting_problem{$_})
00521                                   ? sprintf("%0.1f",$number_of_attempts_for_problem{$_}/$number_of_students_attempting_problem{$_})
00522                                   : '-'}                               
00523                                    @problemIDs 
00524             ]
00525         )),
00526         CGI::end_table();

00528 #####################################################################################
00529 # table showing percentile statistics for scores and success indices
00530 #####################################################################################
00531     print  
00532 
00533             CGI::p(CGI::i($r->maketext('The percentage of students receiving at least these scores. The median score is in the 50% column. '))),
00534             CGI::start_table({-border=>1}),
00535                 CGI::Tr(
00536                     CGI::td( ['% '.$r->maketext('students'),
00537                               (map {  "&nbsp;".$_   } @brackets1) ,
00538                               $r->maketext('top score').' ', 
00539                              
00540                              ]
00541                     )
00542                 ),
00543                 CGI::Tr(
00544                     CGI::td( [
00545                         $r->maketext('Score'),
00546                         (prevent_repeats map { sprintf("%0.0f",100*$score_percentiles{$_})   } @brackets1),
00547                         sprintf("%0.0f",100),
00548                         ]
00549                     )
00550                 ),
00551                 CGI::Tr(
00552                     CGI::td( [
00553                         $r->maketext('Success Index'),
00554                         (prevent_repeats  map { sprintf("%0.0f",100*$index_percentiles{$_})   } @brackets1),
00555                         sprintf("%0.0f",100),
00556                         ]
00557                     )
00558                 )
00559             ;
00560 
00561     print     CGI::end_table(), 
00562 
00563         ;
00564 
00565 #####################################################################################
00566 # table showing percentile statistics for scores and success indices
00567 #####################################################################################
00568     print  
00569 
00570             CGI::p(CGI::i($r->maketext('Percentile cutoffs for number of attempts. <br/> The 50% column shows the median number of attempts'))),
00571             CGI::start_table({-border=>1}),
00572                 CGI::Tr(
00573                     CGI::td( ['% '.$r->maketext('students'),
00574                               (map {  "&nbsp;".($_)  } @brackets2) ,
00575                             
00576                              ]
00577                     )
00578                 );
00579 
00580 
00581     foreach my $probID (@problemIDs) {
00582         print   CGI::Tr(
00583                     CGI::td( [
00584                         CGI::a({ href=>$self->systemLink($problemPage{$probID}) },"Prob $probID"),
00585                         ( prevent_repeats reverse map { sprintf("%0.0f",$attempts_percentiles_for_problem{$probID}->{$_})   } @brackets2),
00586 
00587                         ]
00588                     )
00589                 );
00590     
00591     }
00592     print CGI::end_table();
00593             
00594     return "";
00595 }

00598 #################################
00599 # Utility function NOT a method
00600 #################################
00601 sub threeSpaceFill {
00602     my $num = shift @_ || 0;
00603 
00604     if (length($num)<=1) {return "$num".'&nbsp;&nbsp;';}
00605     elsif (length($num)==2) {return "$num".'&nbsp;';}
00606     else {return "## ";}
00607 }
00608 sub round_score{
00609     return shift;
00610 }
